name: immich
tagline: A self-hosted photo and video backup platform with smart organization
description: Immich is a self hosted photo and video backup solution for mobile and desktop. It offers automatic uploads, face recognition, maps, albums and multi user support, providing a private alternative to big cloud photo services.

features.title: Media Backup
features.description: Backs up photos and videos from client devices to a centralized server

features.title: Media Library Management
features.description: Organizes photos and videos into a searchable and browsable library

features.title: Automatic Upload
features.description: Synchronizes media automatically from supported clients

features.title: Search and Filtering
features.description: Allows media to be located using dates locations and metadata

features.title: Albums and Sharing
features.description: Groups media into albums and shares them with selected users

features.title: Face and Object Recognition
features.description: Identifies and groups media based on detected people and objects

features.title: Web and Mobile Clients
features.description: Accesses the media library through web and mobile applications

features.title: Self-Hosted Media Server
features.description: Runs the media platform on your own infrastructure
